revised_title: Electro-Physiological Researches: Eighth Series and the Conductibility of Muscles and Nerves
tldr: Carlo Matteucci's research explores the relationship between muscle contraction and the electric current in nerves, as well as the conductibility of muscles and nerves. He discovers that the nervous filaments do not contribute to electro-chemical decomposition and that the conductibility of muscles is four times greater than that of nervous substance.
